‚ÑπÔ∏è Calculates stream bitrates based on library variable bitrate_audio_cutoff
Logic is Channel Count * bitrate_audio_cutoff
Generates Variables:
bitrate_audio_cutoff_2
bitrate_audio_cutoff_6
bitrate_audio_cutoff_8

‚ÑπÔ∏è JS work in progress
This tags all the codecs on a list.  But I need a way to set a bitrate cutoff, so only over x bitrate.
That would pretty much eliminate the entire flow on the right...

‚ÑπÔ∏è Ultimate goal is to only encode Lossless sources only.  But right now my filter is not perfect and will pickup a lossy codec if you set the bitrate low enough.  This may be desirable, if you want to process all codecs over a certain bitrate.
Would love ideas on how to simplify and improve!
